basic_information.scholarship_name: Tommy C. Beavers Endowed Graduate Studies Scholarship in Education
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Tommy C. Beavers Endowed Graduate Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education& Professional Studies who are pursuing their masters degree in any area of education related to K-12 with a plan to continue working in the Oklahoma Public School System. Eligibility Requirements Pursuing a Masters degree in any area of Education Minimum 3.0 GPA Completed (6) hours of graduate studies toward a Masters degree in any area of Education related to grades K-12 Currently employed in any area of education in an Oklahoma Public School in grades K-12 Has a desire to continue working in any area of Education for the Oklahoma Public Schools in grades K-12 Financial need to be considered Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
